::KitKat::

She took the blanket and smiled. "Thank you."  She didn't know what 
to make of this wolf. She put the blanket on and looked at Terrorsaur.
"Well, shall we go?" She looked at Rowdy, "Do you need to take 
anything with you before we depart?"

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "Talon Harvilicz" <wilddance_mare@h...> 
wrote:
> Rowdy Wolf:
> 
> 
> Rowdy Wolf's went wide, and it wasn't soon that he gaped his 
mouth. "Second 
> in command? Well, I'm surprised! Last time I saw him, he was a low 
rank. He 
> could barely stand to be near the others. Everyone gave him no 
respect." He 
> laughed. "I am amazed! He managed for himself." He smiled. "The 
stories he 
> told me, now second in command. Perhaps my advise did help." His 
attention 
> came back to the two bots. "Yes, I will go, but will you give me a 
nano 
> klick?"
> 
> The red flier folded his arms. "Sure, whatever it is."
> 
> After that, Rowdy Wolf ran inside of the cave and grabbed a few 
furs. He 
> came back to the two Predacons. "Can you carry these, flier?"
> 
> "My name is Terrorsaur, and I'd suppose I could carry them. I could 
use 
> something like that."
> 
> Rowdy Wolf turned his head to KitKat. "A fur for the trip back?" He 
offered 
> her a fur blanket.
>
